mapbaltimore 0.1.0
  • Reference

Get selected housing permits from Open Baltimore data portal

get_permits.Rd

This function uses the RSocrata package to download Housing Permits from the Open Baltimore data portal. Requests may be filtered by permit type, by date, or by neighborhood, Council District, or Police District.

get_permits(
  area,
  permit_type = NULL,
  start_date = NULL,
  end_date = NULL,
  filter_by = c("neighborhood", "police district", "council district"),
  area_name = NULL,
  geometry = FALSE
)

Arguments

area

An sf object with a 'name' column. If area is provided, the function returns data within the bounding box of the provided area or areas.
start_date

The start date of the time period during which permits were issued in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". An end date must be provided if a start date is provided.
end_date

The end date of the time period during which permits were issued in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". An start date must be provided if an end date is provided.
filter_by

A character vector with the type of area to filter permits by. Supported area types include neighborhoods ("neighborhood"), City Council districts ("council district"), and Police Districts ("police district").
area_name

A character vector with a neighborhood name or Police district name. Filtering by multiple areas or multiple area types is not currently supported.
geometry

If TRUE the returned permit data is converted to an sf object with a projected CRS (2804). Permits with no coordinates are excluded if TRUE. Defaults to FALSE.
request_type

Character vector matching one of the possible permits types ("USE", "DEM", "COM").

Examples


if (FALSE) {
## Get all demolition permits for Council District 9 between 2015 and 2019
get_permits(
  permit_type = "DEM",
  start_date = "2015-01-01",
  end_date = "2019-12-31",
  filter_by = "council district",
  area_name = "9"
)
}

if (FALSE) {
## Get all housing permits for the Mount Washington neighborhood from Dec. 2019 to Jan. 2020
get_permits(
  start_date = "2019-12-01",
  end_date = "2020-01-31",
  filter_by = "neighborhood",
  area_name = "MOUNT WASHINGTON"
)
}
